 UEvent (int fd, short ev, ccallback_type handler, void *arg=0)

Detailed Description

template<>
class UEvent< ccallback_type >

This is the specialization of UEvent for C-style callbacks.

See also:
UEvent

short  ev,

void *  arg = 0 
) [inline]

Creates a new event.

Parameters:
fd File descriptor to monitor for events.
ev Type of events to monitor (see event::type).
handler C-style callback function.
arg Arbitrary pointer to pass to the handler as argument.
